value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We've nearly reached the border
between Askr and Embla. We should
arrive at the village soon.$k$pIt was shrouded in darkness for some
time, but has allegedly returned to its
original state.$k$pHowever, that doesn't mean we can
let our guard down.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Please be cautious. Vestiges of
Embla's power remain here still,
though they have weakened.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We should thoroughly investigate
what influence the darkness still
holds in the village.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Agreed. It still feels...ominous here.
Like something terrible could happen
if you weren't paying attention...$k$pOh, it's hard to see where you're
stepping in that overgrowth, so be
careful, $Nu.$k$p$Fo500,0,0,0,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What's happening?! Hang on!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No! Our summoner is getting
pulled away into the darkness!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Summoner! Wh-what can we do?
This is a crisis most dire!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1500|...$k$pUrgh... My head... Everything's hazy...$k$pWhat is this place? The last thing I
remember is losing my powers upon
entering Askr...$k$pOh, th-that's right! Lady Embla! My
lady, are you here?! Are you—$k$pHuh?$k$pWell, well, if it isn't Askr's precious
summoner! This is unexpected...$k$pHm... hey, you're not dead, are you?
No, just unconscious, it seems. What
a shame.$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|What now?! Some kind of light?
Seems to be coming from the
summoner's divine weapon.$k$pIf I recall correctly, this weapon is
capable of summoning Heroes from
other worlds... Huh?$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_闇ハイドラ,ch05_64_Hydra_M_Dark23,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_魔器闇クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Dark23Weapon01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_闇マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_Dark23,Face|Where...am I?
Michalis, Minerva...$k$p$WmMPID_闇ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_Dark23,Face|What the— What's going on?!$k$pIt seems we are sealed away in
darkness. This warrants intervention!
Allow me to seize control!$k$pHey, child! You, over there! You're
the one who sealed us away in this
darkness, aren't you?!$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what? Me?! I've got nothing to do
with it! This imbecile's weapon just
acted on its own!$k$p$WmMPID_闇ハイドラ,ch05_64_Hydra_M_Dark23,Face|This is not Valla.$k$pI see... Then the future I beheld was
directing me to this moment.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Wh-what are you babbling about?
Whoa!$k$p$WmMPID_魔器闇クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Dark23Weapon01,Face|Life...exists to be harvested...$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Anger|H-hey, watch it! Are you trying to
kill me, swinging your sword around
like that?$k$p$WmMPID_闇マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_Dark23,Face|Do you also intend...to meddle in
Lord Medeus's plans? If so...you
must die...$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Urgh! Come on, Summoner, wake up
and make yourself useful!$k$pDo you really intend to die like
that, just lying there like a slug?!
Of all the idiotic—$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Summoner! Are you unharmed?
Unworthy though I am, as Lord Askr's
retainer, I am honor bound to—$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What's the cow doing here?!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh my, you seem to be in the midst
of a perilous quandry! I should think
flight the most prudent response.$k$pCome! I shall carry the summoner.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|How dare you ignore me when I'm
talking to you, cow?! H-hey!$k$p
